entry.title: Entry #1162 in The New York Times Company v. Microsoft Corporation, 1:23-cv-11195
entry.summary: ORDER: The Court held a discovery status conference for all actions in this matter on Thursday, January 15, 2026. As ORDERED at the January 15 Conference: The Court held a discovery status conference for all actions in this matter on Thursday, January 15, 2026. As ORDERED at the January 15 Conference: News Plaintiffs' motion to compel Microsoft's production of output log data (ECF 1014) is DENIED as premature. The parties are directed to continue meeting and conferring and to provide an update in the January 22, 2026, joint status letter. OpenAI's motion for the Times's profit-and-loss statements (ECF Nos. 1028, 1032) is DENIED. News Plaintiffs' motion to compel OpenAI's production of output log data (ECF 1061) is GRANTED in part. OpenAI is directed to amend their PII redactions and re-produce the sample by January 22, 2026. OpenAI's motion for a protective order regarding Greg Brockman's deposition is DENIED. (ECF 1041). The deposition will be capped at 11 hours, however, Mr. Brockmanmay elect whether his deposition will occur over a one- or two-day period and further set forth in this Order. The parties' briefing schedule for the February 11, 2026, discovery status conference is as follows: i. Opening briefs are due by Friday, January 30, 2026; ii. Opposing briefs are due by Wednesday, February 4, 2026; and iii. The parties' joint dispute chart is due by Thursday, February 5, 2026. The Clerk of Court is respectfully directed to close the following ECF Nos. in Case No. 25-MD-3143: 1014, 1023, 1028, 1034, 1037, 1041, 1043, 1050, 1051, 1052, 1053, 1054, 1056, 1057, 1058, 1059, 1061, 1066, 1070, 1073, 1074. Motions terminated: (1082 in 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW, 1014 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW) LETTER MOTION to Compel Microsoft Corp. to produce immediately, in a readily searchable remotely-accessible format, the approximately 8.1 million consumer Copilot (f/k/a Bing Chat) output logs addressed to Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang fro filed by The New York Times Company, DP Media Network, LLC, Northwest Publications, LLC, ORB Publishing, LLC, San Jose Mercury-News, LLC, Orlando Sentinel Communications Company, LLC, Sun-sentinel Company, LLC, Daily News LP, Chicago Tribune Company, LLC, (1037 in 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW, 874 in 1:23-cv-08292-SHS-OTW) LETTER MOTION to Compel The Authors Guild to produce five clawed back documents addressed to Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang from Katie Lynn Joyce, Allison S. Blanco, Caitlin Sinclaire Blythe dated January 5, 2026. filed by OpenAI, Inc., OpenAI GP LLC, OpenAI Startup Fund GP I LLC, OAI Corporation LLC, OpenAI LP, OpenAI OpCo, L.L.C., OpenAI Startup Fund I LP, OpenAI GP, LLC, OpenAI Holdings LLC, OpenAI, Inc. entry.title: Entry #1157 in The New York Times Company v. Microsoft Corporation, 1:23-cv-11195
entry.summary: ORDER denying without prejudice (1103) Letter Motion for Discovery in case 1:23-cv-11195-SHS-OTW; denying without prejudice (1061) Letter Motion for Discovery in case 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW. The Court is in receipt of News Plaintiffs' motion for an evidentiary hearing concerning the production of the 20 million chat logs, and OpenAI's response, discussed at ECF Nos. 1061 and 1126. News Plaintiffs' motion for an evidentiary hearing is DENIED without prejudice. Parties are directed to meet and confer and come to the January 15, 2026, discovery status conference prepared to discuss: (1) the process behind the "substitution" of "user-deleted data," and how the processes for deletion by users were or were not compliant with the May 13, 2025 Preservation Order; (2) the process behind "PII" redactions; and (3) the basis for excluding conversation logs generated for "litigation-related purposes," and the process involved in doing so. (ECF 1126 at 2). This will be the first issue that the Court will address at the January 15, 2026 conference. SO ORDERED. (Signed by Magistrate Judge Ona T. Wang on 1/14/2026) Filed In Associated Cases: 1:25-md-03143-SHS-OTW et al. (vfr) (Entered: 01/14/2026)
